features: **CONTACT US DIRECTLY THROUGH AMAZON FOR TECH SUPPORT**Destroy And Securely Wipe And Remove All Personal information. Did you know deleting files or formatting a hard drive does NOT actually get rid of all data? Our DBAN Disk Wiper Will! Key Product Features
Meets Department Of Defense DOD 5.220.22-M SPECS. Military grade secure delete that is EASY to use. Finally ANYONE can SAFELY and SECURELY erase their Hard Drive.
Don't let someone steal your identity! Our software Helps Prevent Identity Theft By Quickly And Easily destroying all of the data on any hard drive.

So easy to use that even a NOVICE can securely and permanently delete all of the personal data on any hard drive. Please note: You simply have to set your PC to boot from the DVD in the BIOS (we include instructions) and follow the step by step guide to permanently delete all of your personal information.

FREE * Step-By-Step Instruction Sheet From GEDDES SOFTWARE included with each order. We also offer FREE Email support to help our customers make the best use of our amazing Disk Wiper Hard Drive Eraser software. Compatible with Win 10 8.1 8 7 XP, MAC, LINUX 32/64 BIT
body.description: Completely Erase Your Hard Drive Securely, Permanently and make sure it is Unrecoverable with the GEDDES SOFTWARE Hard Drive Eraser Disk WiperNEVER Sell, Donate, Give Away or Return your PC Before you You Erase Your Hard Drive With The Hard Drive Eraser With DBan Disk Wiper Software. You may not realize that when you dispose of your hard drive or donate your computer to a charity, if you simply reset your operating system without completely deleting the data with the Hard Drive Eraser, there will still be traces of your personal information and files from the old owner.Did you know that simply deleting files and folders doesn't actually delete the files completely? Instead, it simply removes it from the content of your hard drive.Most people have no idea that even when they reset their computer to factory default or erase pictures and documents that their personal information is still on the hard drive. A quick run of a simple and free to download undelete program could be used to restore all of the data on to the hard drive - allowing thieves to steal not just photos, files, personal information, but also your entire identity!This data will stay there until your hard drive needs to re-write on the very same sectors with new data. This can take several months, depending on the size of your hard drive.And that is where our DISK WIPER Hard Drive Eraser is different. This Disk Wiper Software will securely wipe any computers hard drive beyond any possible recovery or repair!The personal information that stays behind when you simply delete files WITHOUT the Disk Wiper Hard Drive Eraser can include really personal information. This can include your SSN or SIN number, your credit card numbers, bank account details, personal logins to Facebook and other social media sites or your medical or tax records.Meets DoD 5220.22-M Hard Drive Erase StandardsA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to use and it did the job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No instructions were included with the disk, in spite of stating the item included them. I cannot find them on line either. Given what disk is designed to do, wipe a drive, I want to know I am using it correctly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job. Many erase options.
reviews.reviewText: Lots of wipe options, including one that took 2 days to run. Estimates of remaining wipe time fluctuate a lot during wipe, but who would care?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
reviews.reviewText: Followed instructions to the letter (multiple times) and cannot make this Hard Drive Eraser work on my HP Elite Book. Invariably boots up to Windows without ever providing a program dialog. While I mention the instructions, they are very poorly written and in a font so small that it takes a magnifying glass to read. Literally. Likewise, the service line is of no help. Their website does not address the issue, nor does it provide any user instructions in larger print. The telephone service line is a recording that says it is too busy to answer. No timely response to text inquiry. Apparently, this software was discontinued in 2015 and no longer tech supported, according to Fossbites review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This software writes and rewrites for hours. If you have a hard drive that has such naughty stuff on it that Mi6 or NSA is going to look at it, throw it in the barbie!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time. Works like it should. No issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not layman friendly as promised, a degree in computer science would be handy but not being very techy minded it rendered this programme unusable for me.
